attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alongside John Lennon, Paul McCartney and George Harrison was Ringo Starr. The Beatles were one of the greatest bands of all time. On 12 June 1965 all the Beatles were granted  Members of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) I believe it is now time to grant Ringo Starr his knighthood.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
